relation: Overridden. Gets a value that indicates whether this collection view supports filtering.
Overridden. Gets a value that indicates whether this collection view supports grouping.
Overridden. Gets a value that indicates whether this collection view supports sorting.
Returns an object that you can use to compare items in this view.(inherited from CollectionView)
Overridden. Gets the number of records in the collection.
Gets or sets the culture to use during sorting.(inherited from CollectionView)
Overridden. Gets the current item in the view.
Overridden. Gets the ordinal position of the current item within the view.
Gets the Dispatcher this DispatcherObject is associated with. (inherited from DispatcherObject)
Overridden. Gets or sets a callback used to determine if an item is suitable for inclusion in the view.
Overridden. Gets a collection of GroupDescription objects that defines how to group the items.
Overridden. Gets the top-level groups that are constructed according to the GroupDescriptions.
Overridden. Gets a value that indicates whether the current item of the view is beyond the end of the collection.
Overridden. Gets a value that indicates whether the current item of the view is beyond the beginning of the collection.
Overridden. Gets a value that indicates whether the resulting (filtered) view is empty.
Gets or sets the item at the given zero-based index.
Overridden. Gets a value that indicates whether the collection needs to be refreshed.
Overridden. Gets a collection of SortDescription objects that describe how the items in the collection are sorted in the view.
Overridden. Gets the unsorted and unfiltered collection that underlies this collection view.

CheckAccess  Determines whether the calling thread has access to this DispatcherObject. (inherited from DispatcherObject) Clear Clears the collection and releases the references on all items currently in the collection. Contains Overridden.
